text: For the Date/Time column type, can you set a Timezone? Like CST PST or a UTC offset?

Can someone give me a quick example of using the not equals when filtering in hubdb
got it. Also, it looks like when you add a checkbox column, the default value is null correct? it only goes 0 or 1 once you have actually clicked on it once?
yes, the dates are always stored as UTC. You can format in any timezone youâ€™d like with datetimeformat or your local timezone with to_local_time
